title: Ground News - Stratford hotel staff give back to Guide Dogs
text:
Summary by Ground News Pooches from the charity paid a visit to The Arden Hotel to receive fuss from staff as well as a �450 donation raised from the hotel's Giving Back campaign. The cash donated will go towards helping young pups on their journey to become specially-trained dogs for blind or partially-sighted individuals. Share menu More
